mapper.select: SELECT A.CHAT_ROOM_NO, B.BOARD_NO , C.MEMBER_NM, D.BOARD_TITLE FROM CHAT_ROOM_JOIN A JOIN CHAT_ROOM B ON (A.CHAT_ROOM_NO = B.CHAT_ROOM_NO) JOIN MEMBER C ON (A.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO) JOIN BOARD D ON(B.BOARD_NO = D.BOARD_NO) WHERE A.CHAT_ROOM_NO IN ( SELECT CHAT_ROOM_NO FROM CHAT_ROOM_JOIN WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}) AND A.MEMBER_NO != #{memberNo}
SELECT MESSAGE, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NM, CHAT_ROOM_NO, CREATE_DT FROM CHAT_MESSAGE JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE CHAT_ROOM_NO = #{chatRoomNo}
